Html: Currently I've had to create a spreadsheet from scratch with the changes to Restoration, and finding certain combinations of extremely high crit % (35) giving wierd numbers, and looking forward to being able to compare this to Rawr's models.  However I've not seen anything on the Resto shaman model, is there possibly an eta of when the rough draft may be up and semi-running, as I generally compile off the source and don't use the releases much?
We don't have any active progress on the RestoSham model right now. Please feel free to spread the word that we need help with it.
